<p>Be like Felsmak and test ALL the parts! Get <span class="link-complex"><em><span class="link-complex-target">KSP</span></em></span><a class="link-complex" href="https://twitter.com/search?q=%23KSP" rel="hashtag" target="_blank"><em><span><span class="link-complex-target"></span></span></em></a> for 40% off as part of today’s daily deal on the <a href="http://bit.ly/1fUQQjy"><strong>STEAM STORE</strong></a>.</p>
what in the name of the kraken is THAT MONSTER?

what in the name of the kraken is THAT MONSTER?

It's not a monster IT'S BEAUTIFUL
It can test all the parts in one mission! Very cost-effective. (Wish I'd thought of that. )

It is beautiful

Unfortunately, we still need to deal with those silly altitude and speed restrictions...

One thing I have realised is that getting all the parts from contracts to fit on ONE ship... actually makes me LOSE money. So I've stopped doing that, and I only test the parts when the opportunities arise on the way up to orbit.
